GR14kbss_1-u:2715: jyotsnābhir nava-nīradaḥ kim athavā śuklena nīlo guṇaḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:2717: muktābhiḥ kim u vā tamāla-taruṇaḥ snātaḥ samudbhrājate
GR14kbss_1-u:2718: kiṃ vā śyāma-sarojam ujjvala-vidhukṣodair murārer vapuḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:2737: kaścit paṭuḥ kaṭita ād galad ambu-celaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:2766: vinyāsa eṣa na hi kasya dṛśor viveśa
GR14kbss_1-u:2827: ādāya kaścana tad asya gṛhaṃ viveśa
GR14kbss_1-u:2828: ūce ca kṛṣṇa! janakasya girā bahubhyas
GR14kbss_1-u:2829: tvaṃ dātum arhasi gavām ayutaṃ dvijebhyaḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:2833: śrutvā pitur giram asau cikuraṃ nibadhya
GR14kbss_1-u:2843: sā prāhiṇot kim api bhoktum athāvilambam
GR14kbss_1-u:2855: svayaṃ paktvā yan no tad-aśanam asau kāritavatī
GR14kbss_1-u:2869: sadyo babhūva yata eva tadā tad-āli-
GR14kbss_1-u:2874: mayi sakhi! vyakti tavodayo hy akasmāt
GR14kbss_1-u:2876: diśam adhi rātri sameti kāpi lakṣmīḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:2881: kim api kṛpāmṛtam eva sā vyatārīt
GR14kbss_1-u:2888: rasavati! te gatir ity avaimi nūnam
GR14kbss_1-u:2896: tad ayi sakhi! vidhehi tatra yātrām
GR14kbss_1-u:2904: akṛta vaśāṃ svayam eva tāṃ vrajeśā
GR14kbss_1-u:2915: sakhi! kim api na veda tat savitrī
GR14kbss_1-u:2922: pacasi yad api yaś ca tasya bhoktā
GR14kbss_1-u:2923: sa ca tirayaty amṛtaṃ sadaiva divyam
GR14kbss_1-u:2925: tava sakhi! kaṃ na camatkaroti bāḍham
GR14kbss_1-u:2929: yad avadhi kalayāṃ babhūva sā tvāṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:2938: aparam iyaṃ manute na hetum atra
GR14kbss_1-u:2950: sakhi! tad idaṃ na vadasy ayuktam ittham
GR14kbss_1-u:2956: yad api bata sakhīyaṃ rītir eveha loke
GR14kbss_1-u:2957: tad api tava vaco no laṅghanīyaṃ kadāpi
GR14kbss_1-u:2958: anunaya prathamaṃ tāṃ kintu yuktyā hi vṛddhāṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:2959: parivadati tu yā mām āśu labdhvāpi rāyam
GR14kbss_1-u:2973: janaś chidrānveṣī sa khalu capalo nanda-tanayaḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:2975: vacaḥ pālyaṃ vatse! na ati hṛdayaṃ kiṃ nu karavai!
GR14kbss_1-u:2979: mātaḥ! satyaṃ vadati bhavatī kiṃca gopendra-sūnur
GR14kbss_1-u:2987: bhītir nītis tava nava-vadhū-pālanaṃ cāpi yuktam
GR14kbss_1-u:2988: māśaṅkiṣṭhās tad ayati yathā dṛk-pathaṃ nāsya sādhvyāś
GR14kbss_1-u:2989: chāyāpy asyāḥ svayam aham imāṃ drāk tathā te'rpayāmi
GR14kbss_1-u:3008: py anicchuvad gantum uvāca tāṃ sakhīm
GR14kbss_1-u:3009: astīha kṛtyaṃ na ca me yiyāsutā
GR14kbss_1-u:3022: kim iha satīḥ sa jahāti lokanāthaḥ?
GR14kbss_1-u:3031: kim api nigadya babhūva sāpi tūṣṇīm
GR14kbss_1-u:3037: bhītāsi kiṃ sādhvy aham asmy avitrī-
GR14kbss_1-u:3071: bhartā gobhiḥ svagoṣṭhe ghaṭayitum akhilāṃ rātrim eva nyavātsīt
GR14kbss_1-u:3072: vakṣaḥ prodyan nakhāṅkāvali-citam adharaḥ spaṣṭa-danta-kṣato yat
GR14kbss_1-u:3073: tat sādhvyās te satītvaṃ samucitam adhunā vyaktam ullālasīti
GR14kbss_1-u:3083: adaśad adharam uccais tan-nakhāco itaṃ tad-
GR14kbss_1-u:3084: dhṛdayam idam amuṣyāḥ kiṃ vṛthā śaṅkase tvam
GR14kbss_1-u:3113: yadi calati tadā kutaḥ kva yāmī-
GR14kbss_1-u:3160: kim api jagāda ca tāṃ tadaiva kaundī
GR14kbss_1-u:3164: tava savayaḥ sada eva yat pramāṇam
GR14kbss_1-u:3168: dhṛtim iha hṛdi dhartum īśiṣe no
GR14kbss_1-u:3169: yad api tad apy abale! kṣaṇaṃ dadhīthāḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:3178: tad api niyokṣyasi hā punas tam asyām
GR14kbss_1-u:3184: svam iva sakhi! paraṃ janaṃ na viddhī-
GR14kbss_1-u:3233: sakhi! kim aparam asti vartma pādau
GR14kbss_1-u:3234: na mama puraś calato 'sya kiṃ karomi
GR14kbss_1-u:3239: karaṇa-paṭus tava kiṃ bhiyā hriyā vā
GR14kbss_1-u:3241: laghu laghu gantum iyeṣa sā tad agre
GR14kbss_1-u:3248: laya iti varṇayituṃ na gīr apīṣṭe
GR14kbss_1-u:3276: bhavasi na vety uditāha sā svasakhyā
GR14kbss_1-u:3306: saprāṇāḥ kim amī ime kim atha vety unmīlataḥ saṃśayād-
GR14kbss_1-u:3376: tad iha kuruta putryaḥ! sādhu bhakṣyāṇi yatnād
GR14kbss_1-u:3377: dara-rucir api vatsaḥ saspṛhaṃ me yathātti
GR14kbss_1-u:3389: tvam iha rasavatīṃ me yāhi rādhe! prayatnāt
GR14kbss_1-u:3398: trijagati na hi kaścit tvām ṛte yasya vettā
GR14kbss_1-u:3437: śaśimukhi! va akāni tvaṃ vidhehi prayatnād
GR14kbss_1-u:3439: praṇaya sumukhi! ramyāḥ śarkarā-pa ikās tvaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:3556: pālīḥ smitena mṛdunā vacasā ca bālā
GR14kbss_1-u:3573: yad yena yena vidhinā ruciratvam etya
GR14kbss_1-u:3574: yad vyañjane yad upayujyata ity avetya
GR14kbss_1-u:3610: yad yatra yatra lavaṇaṃ ca tathā pramāṇaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:3630: kim api jagāda paṭur baṭuṃ miṣeṇa
GR14kbss_1-u:3635: kiṃ kiṃ tvayā sādhitam etayā saha
GR14kbss_1-u:3644: rādhāṃ praśaṃsanty atha tāṃ ca rohiṇī
GR14kbss_1-u:3832: madhye hemamayī vyadhāyi rucirā pātrī śubhair odanaiḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:3838: yuktāṃ dakṣiṇato nidhāya nika e tasyāś ca bhṛṅgārakān
GR14kbss_1-u:3839: karpūreṇa suvāsitena payasā pūrṇān vyadhāt kānakān
GR14kbss_1-u:3845: ānetuṃ prajighāya vatsala-manāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ ca rāmaṃ ca sā
GR14kbss_1-u:3846: dhātreyīm atha tau samīyatur atiśraddhā-vaśād añjasā
GR14kbss_1-u:3850: natvā mātaram ājñayā saha-balas tasyāḥ samullāsanaḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:3864: mātṛbhyāṃ krama-darśitena hi pathā bhoktuṃ samārabdhavān
GR14kbss_1-u:3865: yad yad bhoktum upakramaṃ sma kurute tyaktuṃ na tat soḍhavān
GR14kbss_1-u:3866: bhoktuṃ tat tad aśeṣam apy abhilaṣan sāmarthyavāṃś ca svayaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:3867: kiñcit kiñcid abhukta vīkṣaka-bhiyā durvāda-bhītyāpy ayam
GR14kbss_1-u:3872: svāduṅkāram adann avāg api hṛdā so 'pi praśaṃsann alam
GR14kbss_1-u:3879: ny ādan mātṛ-mude bhaved api yathā paktrī-manorañjanā
GR14kbss_1-u:3880: tān sarvān saha-bhojinaḥ sarasayā vācā hasan hāsayan
GR14kbss_1-u:3881: bhuñjadhvaṃ na parityajeta kim apīty ekāntam āhlādayan
GR14kbss_1-u:3961: kīśeśo dadhi-lampa o 'yam iti tān kṛtvonmukhāṃs tad-diśi
GR14kbss_1-u:3962: teṣāṃ bhojana-bhājaneṣu śanakair nikṣipya bhakṣyaṃ nijaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:3963: sarvaṃ bhuktam idaṃ mayeti sa punar garvāyamāno 'vadat
GR14kbss_1-u:4247: svāduṅkāraṃ kamala-nayanaḥ saspṛhaṃ tat tad annaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:4250: prāśnann ambā-manasi nibiḍaṃ sa pramodaṃ vyatānīt
GR14kbss_1-u:4263: mṛdu mṛdu madhurānnaṃ preyasīṃ prekṣya kṛṣṇaḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:4302: kṣut-kṣāmo 'si tvaṃ ca nāśnāsi tat tām
GR14kbss_1-u:4303: ambām etāṃ māṃ ca kiṃvā dunoṣi
GR14kbss_1-u:4316: taṃ vīkṣya mandaṃ punar apy adantaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:4321: idam idam atimiṣṭaṃ vatsa! bhuṅkṣveti mātā
GR14kbss_1-u:4331: py atṛptā taṃ tṛptaṃ muhur atha sutaṃ prāśayad iyam
GR14kbss_1-u:4343: ny āmṛjya sādhu mṛduleṣikayā ca dantān
GR14kbss_1-u:4359: kuleṣv atha viśaśramuḥ parijanair amī vījitāḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:4392: janani! mayi jananyāṃ kiṃ nu lajjedṛśīyaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:4393: suta iva mama cetaḥ snihyati tvayy atīva
GR14kbss_1-u:4394: ayi tad apanayaināṃ yāmi nirmañcanaṃ te
GR14kbss_1-u:4395: śiśiraya mama netraṃ bhuṅkṣva paśyāmi sākṣāt
GR14kbss_1-u:4399: yūyaṃ ca me stha tanayās tv anayā hriyā kiṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:4408: pa air mārjitvā ca svaparijana-dattā himakarā
GR14kbss_1-u:4409: viyuktā vī īs tā vara-kanaka-gauryo bubhujire
GR14kbss_1-u:4414: tad bhūṣaṇaiḥ subahuśaḥ saha yāni yatnāt
